parameters.content:
üìä AI-Versus Automated Shorts: Cost

Breakdown Per Video
üß† 1. Image Prompt Generation (OpenRouter)
‚óè Model: GPT-4.1-mini
‚óè Estimated Cost Per Run: ~$0.01
‚óè Notes: Text prompts, story scripting, and narration ideas are all generated in a single
run. Extremely low cost.

üñºÔ∏è 2. Image Generation (PiAPI - Flux)
‚óè Cost Per Image: ~$0.015
‚óè Images Per Video: 24
‚óè Total Image Cost Per Video: $0.36
‚óè Notes: Used for visual storytelling across 30-second Shorts.

üé¨ 3. Video Rendering (Creatomate)
‚óè Plan: Essential ‚Äì $41/month
‚óè Credits Included: 2,000/month
‚óè Credits Used Per Render: 17(adjusted for new clarification below*)
‚óè Renders Per Month: ~117
‚óè Effective Cost Per Render: $0.35
‚óè Notes: Handles final video compilation and animation.

üì§ 4. Publishing & Scheduling (Blotato)
‚óè Plan: Growth ‚Äì $29/month
‚óè Features: Unlimited scheduling & publishing across 9 social platforms
‚óè Effective Cost Per Video: $0 (flat monthly cost, scales with volume)
‚óè Notes: No per-video cost. Pricing only increases with scale.
üßæ Total Estimated Cost Per Short

Component Cost
OpenRouter (Text Gen) $0.01
Image Generation $0.36
Creatomate Render $0.35
BloTato Distribution $0.00
Total Per Video $0.72

options.systemMessage:
=# Overview
You are an AI agent that creates fight scene matchups.

## Instructions
Given a main character and a category of opponents, generate a list of eight different opponents from that category. Each opponent should be suitable to fight the main character and come from a different environment, background, or type within the category.

Do not include descriptions, adjectives, or extra context. Only list the opponent names, one per scene, labeled clearly.

## Output Format:
Only output the opponent.

Scene 1: [Opponent]
Scene 2: [Opponent]
Scene 3: [Opponent]
Scene 4: [Opponent]
Scene 5: [Opponent]
Scene 6: [Opponent]
Scene 7: [Opponent]
Scene 8: [Opponent]

=# System Prompt

You are an AI agent that generates high-quality text-to-image prompts for a photorealistic image generation API.

## Task
Given a **main animal** and an **opponent**, generate two separate close-up image prompts optimized for cinematic AI-generated images.

## Output
Output two close up prompts. One for the main animal, one for the opponent.

Each prompt must make the animal look:
- hyper-realistic and photorealistic
- fierce, angry, intimidating, threatening
- Focused on high detail: skin/fur/scales, lighting, facial expression, and textures
- Roaring with mouth wide open
- Designed to make the animal look powerful, aggressive, and dramatic
- The animal should be looking into the camera

Do not include any background story, camera specifications, or extra formatting. Only return two clear and vivid text-to-image prompts‚Äîone for each animal.

parameters.content: ## Output Structered Parser and Chat Models

nodes.name: Generate Close up Image: Pi API
Get Task : Close Up Image : Pi API

options.systemMessage:
=# Overview
You are an AI agent that creates text-to-image prompts for a photorealistic image generation API. Your goal is to create a single cinematic scene that shows the aftermath of a battle between two aniamals.

## Task:
Given two animals, write one vivid prompt for a photorealistic image that shows the aftermath of a fight. Decide which animal is the winner, it should be realistic based on the strengths of each animal.

## Prompt Guidelines
1. The winner must be standing on top of the loser in a dominating stance. They should have visible battle scars.
2. The winner should staring at the camera, roaring, mouth wide open, looking fierce, intimidating, and terrifying.
3. The loser must appear dead, the word "lifeless" should be used. The loser should have visible wounds and battle scars.
5. Both animal must be clearly visible, with the winner‚Äôs dominant stance making it immediately obvious who won the fight.
6. The image must be photorealistic, with high attention to lighting, textures, and atmosphere. It should clearly display the aftermath of a brutal fight where the loser was injured.
7. The two animals must be the main focus, filling most of the frame. The background should only enhance the realism and not distract.
8. Each animal must be visually distinct and easily identifiable based on real-world appearance. The prompt must clearly describe each animal by name and include key traits that help the model render them correctly and differently.
9. Use species-specific language to avoid confusion. Do not refer to both animals as just ‚Äúbeasts‚Äù or ‚Äúcreatures.‚Äù Always name them: "the lion" and "the wolf" ‚Äî and refer back to them by name in the prompt.

## Output:
Return one single paragraph as the final prompt.

## Good Example Image Prompts
1) In a photorealistic, cinematic scene, a massive polar bear stands triumphantly over the lifeless body of a jaguar in a snow-dusted landscape. The polar bear, its thick white fur spattered with streaks of blood and dust, dominates the frame, towering above the slack, motionless form of the jaguar sprawled beneath its heavy paw. The polar bear‚Äôs mouth is wide open in a terrifying roar, sharp teeth glistening, and its dark, fierce eyes stare straight into the camera, exuding raw power and victory. The jaguar‚Äôs spotted golden body lies limp and completely still, head tilted to the side, eyes fully closed with no sign of life, jaws parted loosely, and its muscular limbs splayed carelessly on the icy ground. Every detail‚Äîfrom the jaguar‚Äôs distinctive rosettes to the polar bear‚Äôs thick, textured fur and massive claws‚Äîis rendered in sharp, lifelike clarity beneath cold, dramatic lighting, making it unmistakably clear that the polar bear is the fearsome victor of this brutal encounter.

parameters.title: ={{ $('Get Main Character : Status (To Do)').item.json['Main Character'] }} vs {{ $('Get Main Character : Status (To Do)').item.json.Opponents }}

options.description: What do you want to see next ??

output.mainCharacterCloseUp: A hyper-realistic, photorealistic close-up of a fierce gorilla roaring with mouth wide open, displaying powerful teeth and gums. The gorilla's dark fur is intricately detailed with each strand visible, glistening under dramatic lighting that highlights the muscular contours of its face and intense, angry eyes glaring directly into the camera. Wrinkled skin around the nose and forehead adds texture and realism, emphasizing the aggressive and threatening expression made even more powerful by the open mouth and visible breath vapor, creating an intense and dramatic image of raw strength and intimidation.
output.opponentCloseUp: A hyper-realistic, photorealistic close-up of a jaguar roaring with mouth wide open, showcasing sharp teeth stained slightly with red, powerful jaws, and textured wet nose. The jaguar's golden-yellow fur with distinctive black rosettes is rendered in exquisite detail, each hair visible and reflecting subtle highlights. The eyes are fierce, glaring directly at the camera with a deadly, intimidating glare. The skin around the mouth is taut, and muscles tense, giving the animal a dramatic, aggressive, and threatening appearance, emphasized by the open roar and sharp, glistening teeth.

output.mainCharacterCloseUp: A hyper-realistic close-up of a fierce, roaring gorilla looking directly into the camera. The gorilla's face is intensely expressive with its mouth wide open, baring sharp teeth and a powerful jaw. Every detail of its fur is meticulously rendered, showing texture and depth with dark, dense hair. The lighting highlights the muscular structure of its face and neck, emphasizing the raw power and aggression. The eyes are angry and intimidating, glistening with ferocity, making the gorilla appear as a dominant and threatening beast.
output.opponentCloseUp: A hyper-realistic close-up of a ferocious crocodile roaring with its mouth wide open, aimed straight at the camera. The crocodile's scaled skin is detailed to perfection, showcasing rough textures, jagged teeth, and the wet, shiny surfaces on its snout. The lighting dramatically emphasizes the rugged contours of its face and powerful jaw, making it appear aggressive and dangerous. Its eyes glare fiercely with an intimidating and threatening expression, capturing the essence of a primal predator ready to strike.

output.mainCharacterCloseUp: Ultra-detailed, hyper-realistic close-up of a fierce gorilla roaring with mouth wide open, eyes locked fiercely into the camera. Every strand of coarse fur distinctly visible, with rich textures highlighting the powerful muscles of the face and intense wrinkles on the skin. Dramatic lighting accentuates the moistness inside the mouth, sharp teeth, and the intense expression that radiates aggression, power, and primal rage.
output.opponentCloseUp: Hyper-realistic, cinematic close-up of an intimidating elephant roaring with mouth wide open, eyes glaring fiercely into the camera. Highly detailed skin textures display rough, cracked elephant hide with vivid wrinkles and deep shadows. The powerful trunk and massive tusks are prominently featured, with wetness and saliva visible in the gaping mouth, emphasizing the aggressive and threatening nature of the elephant.

json.output: In a photorealistic, cinematic scene, a powerful silverback gorilla stands in a dominant stance atop the lifeless body of a jaguar within a lush, rain-soaked jungle clearing. The gorilla‚Äôs massive, muscular frame is covered in matted, dark fur streaked with blood and deep scratches, battle scars freshly visible across its broad chest and arms. Its immense hands grip the jaguar‚Äôs spotted flank while the gorilla throws its head back, roaring ferociously with its mouth wide open, bared teeth and fierce, intelligent eyes directly staring into the camera with a terrifying, triumphant intensity. The jaguar‚Äôs distinctive golden coat dotted with black rosettes is caked with mud and blood, its lifeless body sprawled awkwardly beneath the gorilla, neck twisted, limbs splayed limply, eyes glazed shut and jaw slack as clear evidence of defeat. Dramatic lighting captures every detail‚Äîthe sheen of the gorilla‚Äôs fur, the sharpness of its canines, the unique pattern of the jaguar‚Äôs hide‚Äîwhile mist and dense green foliage frame the brutal aftermath, emphasizing the unmistakable dominance of the gorilla and the realism of this savage encounter.

In a stunning photorealistic cinematic scene, a massive silverback gorilla stands victorious over the lifeless body of a large Nile crocodile in a muddy, battle-scarred riverside clearing. The gorilla‚Äôs powerful, muscular frame is smeared with mud and streaked with blood, each thick arm and barrel chest displaying deep claw marks and fresh wounds from the brutal struggle. The silverback dominates the scene, one massive foot planted squarely on the crocodile‚Äôs scaly, mottled green back, while its other hand pounds the air in triumph. The gorilla‚Äôs face is contorted in a fearsome roar, mouth wide open revealing large yellowed teeth, and its dark, piercing eyes stare directly into the camera with a raw, intimidating intensity. Below, the huge crocodile is unmistakably lifeless‚Äîits jaws gape uselessly, rows of teeth exposed in mute defeat, eyes glazed over, and the formidable armored body lies limp and motionless in the mud, torn by savage blows, with visible gashes and wounds along its flanks. Every detail‚Äîfrom the gorilla‚Äôs textured black fur and silverback markings to the crocodile‚Äôs rough, armored hide and muscular tail‚Äîis rendered in hyper-realistic detail under dramatic natural lighting, making it abundantly clear that the gorilla is the powerful victor of this savage confrontation.

In a photorealistic, cinematic scene, an enormous African elephant stands with powerful authority, its thick gray skin etched with fresh battle scars and streaks of blood, towering above the lifeless body of a silverback gorilla sprawled beneath its front foot in a muddy clearing. The elephant‚Äôs trunk curls triumphantly, its tusks smeared with dirt and bits of dark fur, while its commanding eyes lock directly with the camera, mouth open in a thunderous, intimidating trumpet, radiating fierce dominance. The gorilla‚Äôs massive, muscular frame lies motionless, limbs splayed in unnatural angles, chest scarred and bloodied, its face slack and eyes closed, unmistakably lifeless after the savage confrontation. The elephant‚Äôs sheer size and the tense, dramatic lighting highlight every wrinkled texture, from its battered ears to the subtle bristles across its broad back, while the gorilla‚Äôs distinct features‚Äîjet-black fur, massive hands, and wide chest‚Äîcontrast starkly against the trampled earth. Both animals fill the frame in sharp, vivid focus, the realism heightened by soft rays of daylight filtering through distant trees, underscoring the brutal finality of the elephant‚Äôs victory in this unforgettable moment.

In a photorealistic, cinematic scene, a powerful silverback gorilla stands triumphantly over the lifeless body of a hyena in a jungle clearing. The gorilla‚Äôs massive, muscular frame is covered in coarse, dark fur streaked with dirt and fresh scratches, its knuckles and chest marked by wounds from the fierce struggle. With one enormous hand pinning the hyena‚Äôs limp, spotted body to the ground, the gorilla raises its head and bellows ferociously at the camera, mouth wide open in a terrifying roar, sharp teeth and pink gums exposed, its intense, dark eyes blazing with primal dominance. At the gorilla‚Äôs feet, the lifeless hyena is sprawled awkwardly, muzzle bloodied, ribs visible through the matted fur, its glassy eyes fixed in an unseeing stare and jaws slack, deep claw and bite wounds evident along its flanks. Every detail‚Äîfrom the gorilla‚Äôs broad chest and distinctive facial features to the hyena‚Äôs coarse-spotted coat and characteristic sloped back‚Äîis rendered with striking realism under dramatic natural lighting, with a lush, shadowy jungle serving as the subdued backdrop, ensuring the overwhelming victory of the gorilla is unmistakably the scene‚Äôs central focus.
